subject.Citation: An inverse correlation was identified between low membrane expression of CDH1 and high nuclear HDAC3 expression

No correlations were found between cytoplasmic HDAC3 expression and CDH1 expression location

Spearman correlation coefficient r = 0.440, P < 0.001, Table 3
P > 0.05, Supplementary Tables S2, S3
